column4: My ubuntu got horribly broken after attempting to upgrade to Gutsy, it won't boot up properly, and apt-get won't work...what are my options other than reinstalling from scratch?
Here's what apt-get is telling me: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/50441/
if you load up Synaptic, it'll have an option to "fix broken packages"... or you can do it from the command line
I'm going to read it now, but have you tried "sudo apt-get install -f" to try fixing it?
